speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: Oh! I almost forgot these—we’re supposed to send out these Halloween cards and I plumb near fergot!

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: Because we’re working on a tight deadline, these cards have a timer in the upper right hand corner.

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: When the timer reaches zero, that’s it! So make sure you complete all the cards within the time.
